name: Water Staff
description: Expert water staff users can use floods in expertly timed, awe inspiring bursts of magic.

name: Actor Rod
description: Technically it's a Barista Rod, but as long as the dream is still alive, I guess it counts.

name: Hate Wand
description: Most wizards use this wand out of anger, which unsurprisingly leads to suffering.

name: Heart Staff
description: Honestly the weirdest of the staves, and kind of a boring superpower.

name: Stewart Rod
description: Some rods have all the luck, and the Stewart Rod gets all the breaks.

name: Thunder Wand
description: Speaking scientifically, it's probably lightning, but the person who named it wasn't that bright.

name: Lunar Staff
description: Possibly fake.  It casts an odd shadow.  Could be a movie studio knockoff.

name: Love Wand
description: Romantic comedies are right: trading in glasses for contacts counts as a total makeover.

name: Fishing Rod
description: Don't teach a man to fish, feed yourself.  Fishing isn't that hard.

name: Janitorial Staff
description: Janitorial Staves may be underappreciated, but befriend them early and often.

name: Knife
description: Even the mighty oak starts as a simple acorn.

name: El Bow
description: Named by someone who took too many hits to their funny bone.

name: Cool Whip
description: This is a dish best served cold.

name: Butter Knife
description: Check out the low calorie version -- Hard To Believe This Isn't A Butter Knife.

name: Rain Bow
description: Now you can shoot enemies with all the colors of the wind.

name: Shaped Whip
description: Try to detect this whip, not before it's too late, or else you'll get whipped good.

name: Club Knife
description: It's the most exclusive Club in town.

name: Disintegrator
description: This bow is unlicensed.  I'd stand back if I were you.

name: Qilinbian
description: The qilinbian is mostly used for exercise, but certain instructors can wield it with lethal force.

name: The Bloopinator
description: This magical knife can slay overlords and tyrants, but using it comes with a price.

name: Meager Sword
description: Use it.  Abuse it.  Lose it.  That's the Meager Sword Motto.

name: Greedy Pickaxe
description: I'm not saying it's a gold digger, but it has been used in such activities in the past.

name: Striped Club
description: When used as a scratching post, it brings out all the cats and kittens.

name: Buzzblade
description: Set this blade to stun, instead of kill, and have a blast.

name: Gluttonous Axe
description: Gluttonous Axe is not very balanced, and probably should lose some weight around the belly.

name: Night Club
description: Nothing good ever happens with this club after two in the morning, so be careful.

name: Salty Sword
description: A weapon for the eternally angry and margarita fans alike.

name: Wrath
description: This axe's name varies by region. In some places it is known as Crusade, and in others, Cataclysm.

name: Knife Club
description: It's the most exclusive Knife in town.

name: Balmungous
description: Having two or three of these in a group will make a giant difference.

name: Standard Helmet
description: A plain, standard issue helmet given to soldiers on their way to war.

name: Cobalt Helmet
description: This helmet is extremely heat resistant, but it is also highly magnetic.

name: Regular Helmet
description: It does a much better job of preventing brain injuries than a rusty bucket ever could.

name: Super Helmet
description: Be grateful that this one doesn't come with that super annoying regional lockout.

name: Mega Helmet
description: This reactive armor says it reduces damage by 93%, but it's probably just marketing hype.

name: Skull Helmet
description: Forged from the skull of a giant insect, this helmet smells like jerky and deception.

name: Dark Helmet
description: Crafting this helmet always feels like the first time, for the last time.

name: Whimsical Helmet
description: The ideal helmet for stunt performers and clowns alike.

name: Magnetized Helmet
description: The metal in this helmet has been altered at the molecular level.

name: Coal Helmut
description: The perfect head cover for mine shafts and reunification.

name: Simple Hat
description: As long as it covers my bald spot, I'm happy.

name: Princess Tiara
description: This tiara isn't for real princesses, but rather those who demand to be treated like one.

name: Black Hat
description: It also comes in "morally grey."

name: Beach Hat
description: This hat is perfect for summer days, where the sand is coarse, rough and irritating.

name: Green Bay Beret
description: It is made of foam, smells like beer, and comes with a warning against bears, vikings, and lions.

name: The Mind Cap
description: Concealed inside the lining is a healthy dose of tin foil, for obvious reasons.

name: Ornate Crown
description: Clearly overcompensating for something.

name: Spellcasting Hat
description: To awaken it's power, recite the following spell --  "Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet"

name: Noble Tiara
description: Owners of these don't often mix with each other, because they're already stable.

name: All Folks Hat
description: As close to "one size fits all" as fantasy headwear can be.

name: Bandit Mask
description: The perfect disguise for robbing trains.

name: Hidden Mask
description: It matches your complexion perfectly.

name: Rubber Mask
description: Make sure to put the lotion on your skin before wearing this mask again.

name: Cucumber Mask
description: Put it into a jar with vinegar and salt to create a tasty snack.

name: Coffee Mask
description: Seemingly addictive, but comes with strange digestive complications.

name: Pumpkin Mask
description: Especially popular in autumn with Basic Wand users.

name: Stone Mask
description: The eyes in this mask seem droopy, and a little bloodshot.

name: Oxygen Mask
description: Highly flammable.  Proceed with caution.

name: Spoopy Mask
description: Somehow funny, and spooky, all at the same time, like a comedy about a ghost.

name: Volto Mask
description: Use this mask to find out exactly where the rainbow ends.

name: New Gauntlets
description: Fresh from the forge, so treat them right.

name: Shiny Gauntlets
description: Almost mirror-like, adventurers often confuse their enemies wearing these.

name: Plain Gauntlets
description: The exact opposite of The Everything Gauntlet.

name: Pristine Gauntlets
description: These gauntlets have never been touched, until now.

name: Challenge Gauntlets
description: Legend states that these mythical gauntlets are awarded to dragon raiders and cheese hoarders.

name: Fancy Gauntlets
description: For some reason, there's a spot for a gem on the thumb.  That's an odd choice.

name: Old Gauntlets
description: Particularly helpful when your wizards need food badly.

name: Dark Gauntlets
description: The color of these gauntlets baffle smiths and armorcrafters to this day.

name: Dandy Gauntlets
description: Often worn by process servers to deliver copyright disputes.

name: Cool Gauntlets
description: The top prize awarded to record holders for breaking misunderstood records.

name: Gardening Gloves
description: The thumbs are green, as you would expect.

name: Running Gloves
description: Chapped hands are a real problem, and these are the perfect solution.

name: Fighting Gloves
description: Ergonomically designed so you can snap while you sing.

name: Cleaning Gloves
description: Works great for scrubbing sinks or avoiding the hoi polloi.

name: Punching Gloves
description: The knuckles are padded with brass, which seems counterintuitive.

name: Hugging Gloves
description: Politicians wear these so that they don't actually have to touch the great unwashed.

name: Dancing Gloves
description: The fingers of these gloves are detachable, because sure, why not.

name: Loving Gloves
description: Ideally speaking, we should all wear gloves before going to bed.

name: Other Gloves
description: Named by an architect who had to come up with a last minute change.

name: Boxing Gloves
description: These gloves are the traditional gift given to children the day after Christmas.

name: Hamster Clogs
description: These wooden shoes are tiny, and have bits of romaine stuck inside.

name: Mage Moccasins
description: Staunch magical defenders used these in ancient times.

name: Druidic Boots
description: These boots have odd properties that allow it to change form quickly.

name: Fighting Stilettos
description: The perfect shoe for date night and stabbing people in the neck.

name: Bardic Galoshes
description: Smells like ale, and covered in syrup.

name: Master Loafers
description: Frequently worn around the house, they don't often see the light of day.

name: Foxy Slippers
description: One of them appears to have a chip.

name: Hairy Shoes
description: The best excuse to have a second breakfast.

name: Lunar Whalers
description: You aren't sure why, but wearing these makes you feel more energetic.

name: Jay Walkers
description: Upon closer inspection, it appears as if the artist has put their name all over these shoes.

name: Metal Armor
description: Provides strong protection, but limited mobility.

name: Metallic Armor
description: Just make sure you don't get sand in it.

name: Panther Armor
description: If this armor were any heavier, adventurers would collapse from the weight.

name: Slayers Plate
description: The history of this armor is mired in controversy.

name: Leaded Zeppelin Hull
description: Check out the newer version, the Greta Von Hauberk.

name: A Cool Dark Chainmail
description: Given the opportunity, you should paint the back in black or really dark grey.

name: Maidens Plate
description: Named after a torture device, this armor can cause hearing loss.

name: Intense Purple Cuirass
description: Not to be used as a floatation device.

name: Serpent Mail
description: Oddly useful at car washes.

name: Heavy Metal Armor
description: Somehow, this armor only allows one arm through.

name: Novice Cloak
description: A simple protective covering.

name: Apprentice Cloak
description: Worn by initiates looking to find more steady work.

name: Practitioner Cloak
description: It has a protective coating to prevent forest fires and accidental discharge.

name: Journeyman Cloak
description: Wandering magi wear it to harness the elements.

name: Expert Cloak
description: The most experienced spellcasters wear this cloak with pride.

name: Frostflinger Cloak
description: This garment is as cold as ice, but it's a sacrifice worth making for the power it gives.

name: Stormbringer Cloak
description: Made from flannel, it is especially deadly in the dry winter air.

name: Earthslinger Cloak
description: Comes with a hydrophobic coating, so you can cause destruction in style.

name: Lifegiver Cloak
description: It contains many pockets to hide remedies and antidotes for all occasions.

name: Deathcaller Cloak
description: Those who wear this cloak should be forewarned: this cloak may be cursed.

name: Mole Vest
description: Worn by those who hide in plain sight.

name: Assassin Vest
description: This vest allows the wearer to move silently.

name: Bandit Vest
description: Has a handy pocket to keep bandanas and knives.

name: Spy Vest
description: Also comes in black and white.

name: Fugitive Vest
description: Good for those on the run and trying to prove their innocence.

name: Outlaw Vest
description: Great for protecting against the elements while in exile.

name: Grifter Vest
description: When grifting someone, make sure they aren't broke, or well connected.

name: Criminal Vest
description: Designed by a soft spoken judge who understands criminals quite well.

name: Hitman Vest
description: Hitperson just doesn't sound right, but it's a gender neutral vest.

name: Pirate Vest
description: Contains a special shoulder attachment for parrots to perch on.

name: Patience
description: Sometimes the easiest way to win is to wait for your enemy to die.

name: Faithful Buckler
description: Seeing is believing, but blocking with this shield doesn't hurt either.

name: Defiant Targe
description: This shield will help you hold your ground, even in adverse situations.

name: Fair Shield
description: Fairness is okay as long as I get what I want.

name: Wisdom
description: Wisdom is knowing not to put tomatoes in a fruit salad.

name: Generous Blocker
description: Easily able to cover an adventurer and a half.

name: Loyal Companion
description: This shield is lined with fur, so it will keep you warm at night.

name: Dignity
description: The most luxurious possession and richest treasure most people will ever have.

name: Trustworthy Kite
description: Sometimes the best shield against harm is your own principles.

name: Truth Teller
description: One good hit to your enemy's skull should help them give up any secrets.

name: Stones
description: Not safe to own in houses made of glass.

name: Sticks
description: Don't shove this in your bike spokes.

name: Words
description: Use this against yourself before your enemies get the chance.

name: Shooting Stars
description: Protect yourself against bag raiders with a handful of these.

name: Poison Shuriken
description: A little poison will go a long way, so use it modestly.

name: Shining Stars
description: Manages to reflect light, even when covered in blood.

name: Golden Shuriken
description: This weapon broke the mold.  Throw for the moon.

name: Frost Shuriken
description: Consider it a really sharp chill pill.

name: Burning Sticks
description: All it takes is one match to start an explosion.

name: Heart Seeker
description: The fastest way to your enemy's heart is through his stomach, so aim for that.

name: Spells Vol I
description: An introduction into the wide world of magic.

name: Spells Vol II
description: Basic ingredients and techniques commonly used.

name: Spells Vol IV
description: Fun stories from former witches and warlocks.

name: Earthshaping and You
description: How to make your enemies dirty while staying squeaky clean.

name: Pyromania: A Love Story
description: How to make long distance relationships with magma elementals work.

name: Great Hamster Vol XXI
description: New for Vol XXI: a special section on salads and croutons

name: Nal'Dur's Diary
description: I'm so upset.  How can I be expected to end the world when I can't even get Tommy to notice me?

name: Cauldroning 101
description: A deep dive into best practices, but it is so dense most people don't know who the author is.

name: Secret Streams
description: Upon further review, it looks like a manual about divining rods.

name: Efficient Spells 102
description: The final volume from an outcast former expert.

name: Lactuca
description: The beloved pendant of vegetarians and vegans.

name: Gelata Eros
description: A little sticky, and a little nutty, but it makes everyone jealous.

name: Comitatus
description: Created in fertile farmland where great adventures seem to begin.

name: Tacet Gladio
description: Walk softly, and carry a big stick to impale your adversaries with.

name: Ostium Amici
description: Manly men in northern regions are particularly suited for this pendant.

name: Ignis Pullum
description: Contains the feather of an resurrected avian creature.

name: Folium Strennus
description: Used by only the most impassioned adventurers.

name: Magicae Criceta
description: This pendant looks good, and works amazingly well.

name: Inpulsa Sciurus
description: Wearing this trinket bestows a sense of pride and accomplishment.

name: Adipem Pater
description: If this pendant could lose some weight, it would be far more useful.

name: Soldier Ring
description: The soldiers soldered this ring themselves.

name: Mercenary Ring
description: This ring signifies that the wearer holds no allegiances.

name: Chaplain Ring
description: Adorned with certain etchings that make it unmistakable.

name: General Ring
description: Gifted to the most prestigious of generals upon retirement.

name: Tactical Ring
description: Might be a decoder ring, but it's hard to tell.

name: Paladin Ring
description: Contains a small amount of holy water, just in case.

name: Hunter Ring
description: Worn to show prowess and cunning in battle.

name: Trapper Ring
description: Signifies a commitment to a difficult and taxing profession.

name: Berserker Ring
description: The love for this ring is like a ticking clock.

name: Marksman Ring
description: Holds some secrets shown to be invaluable to the most skilled sharpshooters.

name: Leather Belt
description: Keeps your pants up.

name: Timing Belt
description: Make sure to wear this belt at just the right moment.

name: Rodeo Belt
description: Awarded to the best in competition.

name: Rust Belt
description: Once worn by skilled laborers, many years ago.

name: Cowboy Belt
description: The gawdy buckle is supposed to signify wealth.

name: Flat Belt
description: This belt has been left out in the open for way too long.

name: Fan Belt
description: For some reason, this belt is constantly oscillating.

name: Formal Belt
description: Matches perfectly with business socks, for business time.

name: Conveyor Belt
description: The leather in this belt was orginally used in a pulley system.

name: Extra Belt
description: This belt is just way over the top.  Entirely too much going on.

name: Magical Synthesizer
description: Interact with the magical energy from your rare items.

name: Bank
description: Store your precious keepsakes here.

name: Fuse Hut
description: Combine items to make better stuff.

name: The Forgery
description: All or nothing, baby.

name: Fortune Teller
description: Hopefully she shows up.

name: Tinker Hut
description: Chew some rocks and make some stuff.

name: Monster House
description: A catalog of monsters you've seen

name: Museum
description: Catalogue all the items you've made for history

name: Philosopher's Trinket
description: This trinket provides critical thinking skills and a predisposition to murders by train.

name: Theatrical Trinket
description: All who doth adorn their personage with yon trinket will acquire expert knowledgeth in the theatricalth arths.

name: Engineer's Trinket
description: Use this trinket.  It will make your skills better.  End of flavor text.
